I think the first time Dave said he was going to leave in two years was back in 1987, Rob Burnett says. "He was asked a question[ last night]:` How much longer do you see yourself doing this?' Google Apps. After all, Google's core business of search can't prop up the company forever. "Google's business group gets good support overall," says Forrester research analyst Ted Schadler. With Google's core search business under attack from Bing and Yahoo, I would expect them to keep investing in Google Apps for Business. And Microsoft might not want to get too comfortable with the idea of Larry Page as the t-shirt wearing, Wall Street-oblivious CEO: Larry Page may just be an interim leader as Google looks for another Eric Schmidt , Kay

the Philadelphia 76ers to an 83-81 victory over the Boston Celtics that evened their Eastern Conference first-round series at two games each. "Win. It's the only thing we can think about," Allen Iverson said. We fought hard to get back in the series. We're really not thinLeBron James about anything more. The only thing I care about is finishing out. After shooting poorly all game, Allen Iverson made his last three shots and two clinching free throws that sent the series between the long-time rivals back to Boston for Game Five on Friday. che c'? un "unico attacco contro il lavoro con le scelte di Sergio Marchionne e contro le nostre condizioni con la riforma Gelmini" . Chiedono una sorta di alleanza stabile tra sapere e lavoro per un nuovo modello di sviluppo e di societ . Guardano al futuro- segnato dal precariato- con molta, amara consapevolezza. Ma ammoniscono: "Non facciamoci portare via il futuro, lottiamo per difenderlo" .
